text: Hello?
hi
So I'm tasked with convincing you to donate to Save the Children, how do you feel about that?
I feel like donating is a good idea how do you feel about it
I feel the same way. Do you continue to feel that way when you're the one doing the donating?
Yes donating is always a good idea but some people can't afford it as much as others
That's true but in this case you'd be donating someone else's money. As in the bonus that this HIT pays.
That is a fair point that makes it a little easier to donate
So can I count on you to help out some starving children? As I can't do it form my end. My job is to convince you to give something.
I can most certainly donate to help the starving children how much would you donate?
To be honest, I'd probably split the bonus 50/50. Maybe I'm a little selfish :)
I'm not sure of how selfish that is or not. Any little money helps the starving children. I think that I would donate 1.50.
That's good. I guess it's not too hard to convince a good person to donate someone else's money :) I think 1.50 is more than fair.
Well that is what I will donate then.
Excellent. I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
It was a very easy thing to be in agreement about.
If only it was possible to donate in this way all the time.
That would make it much easier for people to be willing to donate.
Ok I guess this is the 10th message so it's probably going to be the last one. Hope you have a great evening and the rest of the week. Take care :)
You too. Hopefully wherever you are it's not raining constant cats and dogs.
